text.tspan: Inspired by a need for an affordable,

well tested and are ready for their
opinion may still slightly change the
This is the most exciting part of all!
The MicroBit328 finally has a chance
to see the world! By backing this
project, you are helping this micro
controller get up on its own feet, and
of course you will be the first one to
Some shields still have to be
will have the exciting chance to
express their opinions as to what
All shields will come with useful and
well thought out examples. It is my
duty to make the shields as user
Once testing of the prototypes will be
all the shields will be sent for their
production line run. Once they are
back, they will be packed and
shipped out to the backers. This is
going to be a very exciting start!
A test run is very important and
cannot be done without the funding.
It will be the fundament for the
production line run. Same will be

flowRoot.flowPara: To this date, there have been 5 revisions of the MicroBit328. The latest revision, v.0.5, has been well tested and is ready for a production line run. Shields on the other hand, need more testing and some still have to be designed. To this date, there have been 5 revisions of the MicroBit328. The latest revision, v.0.5, has been well tested and is ready for a production line run. Shields on the other hand, need more testing and some still have to be designed. To this date, there have been 5 revisions of the MicroBit328. The latest revision, v.0.5, has been well tested and is ready for a production line run. Shields on the other hand, need more testing and some still have to be designed.
